panels.description: Displays the cumulative total number of HTTP requests handled by the application since startup. The value increases continuously and resets only when the application restarts.
panels.title: Total HTTP Requests

panels.description: Shows the total number of HTTP requests received within the selected time range, excluding requests to paths containing "prometheus". Provides insight into application traffic while filtering out monitoring endpoints.
panels.title: Total HTTP Requests (Excluding Prometheus Paths)

panels.description: Displays the total number of client (4xx) and server (5xx) error responses received within the selected time range. Helps monitor application issues and identify potential failures impacting users.
panels.title: Total 4xx and 5xx HTTP Requests

list.description: Unique job ID for the service
list.label: Job Name
list.name: job_name
